alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Chatanika River Valley; Dalton Highway Summits; Delta Junction; Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Fortymile Country; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Northern Denali Borough; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Southern Denali Borough; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Upper Tanana Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 3:58PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Colder Temperatures Over The Interior This Weekend... The Tanana Valley temperatures will drop to 10 to 20 below tonight and Saturday, with 20 to 30 below possible by Sunday. The Northern Interior will see temperatures drop to 20 to 30 below on Saturday night and Sunday. A warming trend is expected over the Interior starting on Monday. A colder airmass has now moved over the Interior. Clearing skies over the Southern Interior will allow surface temperatures to drop tonight. The Northern Interior have clouds and snow tonight and Saturday, but then clear Saturday night and Sunday allowing the temperatures over the Northern Interior to drop then. This weekend is expected to bring the coldest temperatures so far this year to the Interior.
